sentence.Network_en: America's current economic downturn is markedly different from previous recessions.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国目前的经济滑坡与以往的经济衰退明显不同。

sentence.Network_en: The quality of their relationship improved markedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的关系有了显著改善。

sentence.Network_en: The relations between our two countries have improved markedly in every aspect.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们两国的关系在各方面都有了显著的发展.

王玉梅托福词汇 Word_list_24_在线英语听力室 ... maritime 海上的，海事的 markedly 显著地，明显地 marrow cavity 骨髓腔.
TOEFL Part of Speech - Adverb flashcards ... ... likewise 同样地 markedly 显着地 meticulously 小心地.

list.abs: His moderate tone contrasts markedly with the attitude shown by India ., 他的缓和语气与印度展现的态度形成鲜明反差.
Follicular cavity area increases markedly , the follicular epithelial cells were highly significantly lower P 0.001 ., 滤泡腔面积明显增大 , 滤泡上皮细胞高度明显降低 P 均 < 0.001.
improve什么意... ... improve economic performance 提高效益 improve markedly 明显好转 improve soil structure 增进土壤作用.
individual birds have markedly different interests and inclinations .鸟类个体有明显不同的兴趣和爱好。
Water , coal measures and salt have densities markedly different from other earth materials ., 水 , 煤和盐的密度与其它介质有很大的差别.

entry.tran: （改变或区别）显著的，显而易见的
entry.def: A marked change or difference is very obvious and easily noticed.

example.ex: There has been a marked increase in crimes against property...
He was a man of austere habits, in marked contrast to his more flamboyant wife...
example.tran: 他处事严谨，与他爱张扬的妻子形成了鲜明的对比。

entry.tran: 成为攻击对象的;处境危险的
entry.def: If you describe someone as a marked man or woman, you mean that they are in danger from someone who wants to harm or kill them.

example.ex: All he needs to do is make one phone call and I'm a marked man.
example.tran: 他只消打一个电话，我就大难临头了。

auth_sentence.content: That could markedly increase the government's borrowing costs.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That could markedly increase the government's borrowing costs.

auth_sentence.content: The scenes a year later look markedly different.
auth_sentence.res_content: The scenes a year later look markedly different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The scenes a year later look markedly different.

auth_sentence.content: Krishna, said the situation had improved markedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Krishna, said the situation had improved markedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Krishna, said the situation had improved markedly.

sentences.en: Sales have slowed down quite markedly.
The emphasis has shifted markedly in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年重点已经明显改变了。
